name: CS Remove Version Number From CSS & JS
author: Chetan Satasiya

sections.description: This plugin will remove the version number from CSS and JS files.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘CS Remove Version Number From CSS & JS’
  3. Activate CS Remove Version Number From CSS & JS from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download CS Remove Version Number From CSS & JS.
  2. Upload the ‘cs-remove-version-number-from-css-js’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate CS Remove Version Number From CSS & JS from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Compatible with the latest WordPress versions

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: This plugin will remove the version number from CSS and JS files.
description: This plugin will remove the version number from CSS and JS files.

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.
